title: Developing A Wealthy Mindset
description: Developing a Wealthy Mindset is about creating your foundation; it is your General Equivalency Diploma (GED) study guide for the School of Wealth. It teaches how to create a new mindset in and around the world of money. After reading Developing a Wealthy Mindset, you will have the tools to do just that. Moreover, when you attend financial seminars or read other self-help books, you will have a much better chance of converting their teachings into profits. However you acquire your money, the goal here is adopting a wealthy mindset that will enable you to grow your assets in a way that gives you and yours the lifestyle you desire. Warning! This book isnâ€™t for those seeking schemes to get rich quick; it is more about developing the personality traits and core values needed to create, maintain, and grow wealth and to pass that wealth on to others.
author: Joel Wyrick
